pages.text: Yaks is a creature similar to Cows that can be found in Mountain Biomes.$(br2)Like Cows they can be Milked with a Bucket to get Bucket Milk.$(br2)You can use Shears to get Yak Hair, but be careful, because the Yak will attack you immediately after doing it.
On death, like cows they may drop Raw Beef but may drop Yak Hair too.

You can use this new item to make new blocks like Yak Hair Block, Yak Hair Rug and Brown Wool too.$(br2)You can use it to craft $(l:patchouli:tools/buzzier_bees/candle)Candles$(/l).$(br2)You can craft Rope Coil or even a $(l:patchouli:armors/yak_pants)Yak Pants$(/l) too.
